website_summaries.verdict: Rubber football that works well for younger children looking for a cheap starter ball.
pros: Great option for use in poor weather or field conditions
Junior size is ideal for helping preteens learn to grip and throw ball properly
Stands up to tough play, even from dogs
cons: Easy to overinflate, making it larger than intended for kids

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Valentine!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that this was only 6$ and pretty big. I was expecting some foamy little boys ball since the description said "juniors". I didn't get this for literal sport. My friend wanted to surprise her boyfriend with a blue ball since they are long distance but because her parents don't know she's dating anyway she left it up to me to write on it and send it for her. Their secret word is "blue moon" (hence the blue ball) and her boyfriend plays football. So this was the perfect gesture of love for my friend's boyfriends surprise birthday present! The ball says... "If you are reading this, I threw pretty far. blue football, blue moon?"
customer_reviews.author: Jenji

customer_reviews.title: NOT a “ small football” as advertised, too big!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a small or junior football as advertised. It is very large, almost a pro football size, definitely for a large adult sized hand and not a child at all. Disappointed because I was looking for a “ small “ football and this is not in any way shape or form small. Bummer. I would not recommend buying this for a young child or even an older child... it’s simply too large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like a Pro football only smaller
customer_reviews.text: This Jr football is perfectly made for an aspiring quarterback or receiver. The size is great for a child's smaller hands & it goes perfectly with the child's football uniform we purchased. Having the ball already inflated allows to start playing right out of box. These also come in various colors so they can coordinate with their favorite team colors!
customer_reviews.author: citrushome

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small ball for my 6yo and this is great. Very well made and hard but not too hard. It's just an all around good little football idk what else to put. Um, it's gluten free. Idk how many calories because it's a ball. You can't wear it so sizing doesn't matter. It might be dishwasher safe but if you're putting balls in your dishwasher idk what to say. Ohp. That sentence was fun to read a second time
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanLost

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my black German Shepherd. I had a different football that was leather and he tore that up. This one's a little tougher. LOL. I submitted a picture of the new one and a picture of the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Poss

customer_reviews.title: Very RED football
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old nephew. After reading the reviews I knew it was nearly the same size as a regular football and not small. He absolutely LOVES it! The red color made him shriek with delight and he runs around with it in his tiny hands/ arms for hours. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Perez

customer_reviews.title: NOT truly a mini football.
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT mini footballs. These are very close to regular size footballs. The rubber is thin and will not make good dog toys. Their teeth will puncture the ball. I won’t be buying these again. I had mine less than 48 hours and poof, 2nd time I played with my dog with it, flat! If you are not really looking for the true mini football or a smaller ball for kids these are probably ok. The Nike version that’s smaller, hold up better for my dog. She’s a chocolate lab and loves the small Nike footballs.
customer_reviews.author: Coyotevols

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect size for my 10 year old! The price is unbeatable as well. The only issue with ours is that it started to lose air pressure on the second day of using it. No worries though I will buy a cheap air pump to maintain it. Overall I couldn't be happier with this purchase! Edit: 3/16/20 I spoke too soon on this one! The ball has gotten so bad in just one week that it will not hold air for more than an hour or two maybe. Sending it back for one more replacement before I give up and try a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tambunga

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: it's a fun ball to toss around. if you're not caught up in it needing to be authentic, it's great and you can't beat the price. we bought one years ago to toss around at the park with the kids and it ended up being a hand me down for one of the dogs. after she has loved on it for over a year, we needed to replace it and couldn't believe our luck that amazon had them in stock. only toy the dogs have had that was not destroyed in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: BSBonner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This ball was awful. We bought it for our son for his birthday. So we didn't unwrap it right away.... Wished we would have. When he unwrapped it, it had bulges all over the ball. Like it maybe had been blown up too much?? Defiently not hittable! And make sure you open it even if you think "it's a football do I really need to look it over".... Yes look it over or you'll have a disappointed kiddo... Anyways ran to Walmart to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kids love to play
customer_reviews.text: My kids love tossing the football and my previous one was eaten by the dog unfortunately. So now my kids have one that’s great for them to play and practice with and my dog has his that he demolished. Lol. Overall it’s held up to the kids rough housing and playing with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Shorrock

customer_reviews.title: Great almost-full-size football
customer_reviews.text: Lots of complaints about the size in other reviews. This is not a mini football, but a slightly smaller than full-size football, which, in my opinion (and that of my kids) works great for kids. It's got a durable rubber cover and is softer than a real football, but nothing like a foam ball. This seems to me like a nice compromise/step-up from a foam football that's not quite getting to a full-size leather ball.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Greene

customer_reviews.title: Came slightly deflated
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed as this was an item that for some reason I had to wait a really long time to be delivered. In fact, I ordered two and had to cancel the second order as it would not have been received in time for Christmas and after waiting all that time it came slightly deflated. Thankfully I have the right kind of pump to fill it up again but it was very strange that it would ship out like that.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Rue

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller ball for our dog. She loves the small collegiate footballs we have and she was needing a new one. This one is larger than those small collegiate ones we have. However, she loves this football but has already "killed" it. We pump it back up each time we play with it and she promptly kills it again. Not bad for the price, but we will likely look for a different brand for our next go around.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: First off, Amazon has really impressed me with their shipping and handling. Almost everything that I ordered during the holiday season was delivered either early or as expected. I purchased this ball for my young son to play outside with his daddy. My first impression was being surprised at how light weight the ball is yet, very close to the size of a standard sized football. I'm happy with the purchase. Perfect for a small child who is just learning to play the sports.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for this
customer_reviews.text: $4.88?? What a great buy. I love this ball and plan to buy a backup. If you just want to throw in the yard, or on the beach, this ball will really make you happy for what it is. Doesn't feel cgeap, easy grip, and good for small hands. It's bigger than a minature football, but not quite full size. Nice texture. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want to fumble this deal!
customer_reviews.text: We are glad we were able to "catch" this deal, we wouldn't want to "pass" this up. I wouldn't ask for my money back, not even "halfback" or even a "quarterback." Something....something..., "tight-end".....ok I am done. Durable, good deal.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: our 10 month pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 month old Presa Canario loves this ball. IT Takes him awhile but he has gone through 2 balls. Better than. Most balls this is his favorite! Will keep buying ....great price
customer_reviews.author: tracy fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great size for kids-even my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy my toddler a "real football" when he started requesting my "heavy football". This junior size is a bit big for him, but playing catch within close proximity is perfect and he loves it. Good for all family members. The grip is staying good and its just a fun, realistic looking/feeling junior football.
customer_reviews.author: d kem

customer_reviews.title: Not a junior ball
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 4 stars because it's labeled a junior football and it's not. Its large. Maybe minisculely smaller than standard size, but definitely not a "junior" football size. Beyond the incorrect description, it's a good football.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom and Counting

customer_reviews.title: It’s a blue football
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend wanted this. Not sure why, she doesn’t even like football, but she REALLY wanted it for some reason. So I ordered it. It’s a cheap blue football. Pump it up to spec, throw it, and let physics take the wheel. What more can you say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color, no time to exchange.
customer_reviews.text: The football is nice, but I ordered a red and black ball for my nephew's birthday. I received a regular old football. I spent more for something cool and got the same thing I could have bought at Walmart for less.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to toss with the kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my son and I could toss a football around. He is only 5, so this is the perfect size for him. It may be a little big right now, but he can get his hand around it to start throwing some spirals.
customer_reviews.author: jjl1911

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: It is the size of an average football! I was worried it would be to small. This was my son's favorite birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Liked the color and texture, however the ball was mostly used for indoor play since it’s winter and we have a lot of snow, and it has an actual hole in it that can’t be repaired. Keep in mind that it was a gift for Christmas..not much use. Boys are seriously bummed out! They love sports and healthy activities. Happy to announce that we were able to return the original football with no problem and the boys are HAPPILY ENJOYING THEIR NEW FOOTBALL! Thank you. Well Definitely be shopping with you again!
customer_reviews.author: Michele K Love

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old son as a gift since he’d been wanting his own football. He did some good chores and earned this himself. He loves it and we love going out and throwing the ball all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner ball
customer_reviews.text: This low cost ball is good for a beginner. The size is good for my 3 year old’s first football. I expected it to be a no frills ball, but I was disappointed that the ball just came loose, so it’s an underwhelming gift as is.
customer_reviews.author: NHP

customer_reviews.title: Love to play football with my son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. The best is the color blue that he loves. This football is cheap but great quality. I have used it to play with my son and we are enjoying our quarantine drills
customer_reviews.author: Vyas

customer_reviews.title: Great little football
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old son and he loves it. He won’t put it down. Wants to play catch 24 hours a day. It has a great feel and good grip. Perfect little football.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball to play catch with my son. Has great grip. Hasn’t lost any air. I would definitely buy again and I have already recommended to other players on his team.
customer_reviews.author: pro

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Football arrived inflated and not flat. Fun to use with my 9 year old. Good grip but as far a s durability, it's already accumulated some wrinkles towards the ends from when hitting the floor. Doesn't effect use though.
customer_reviews.author: Don Skey

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my little man
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to toss around with my boy (he’s 2 n change). He can grip it and throw it well. It’s already been just side in the rain and is just like it arrived. Will but another when he inevitably looses this one
customer_reviews.author: Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller sized football
customer_reviews.text: I have 4.5 year old twins and these are not too small but a little bit smaller than a regular football. Highly recommended as they are a great size for kids and really great quality. Just know they aren't tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Our son's best ball - and at the best price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional value - the quality of this ball far exceeded our expectations. We use it as out "boat ball" and take it to the beach, play with it in the water, etc. The size, color, and durability are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: GulfGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good value decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for a set. Smaller size is good elementary aged kids. Would have given 5 stars but one ball doesn't hold air as well as the others.
customer_reviews.author: DKSharky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for the price. Wanted to teach my son that being out side is more fun then that stupid video game..yea he hid the ball from me.
customer_reviews.author: The Patterson's

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones
customer_reviews.text: We aren’t football experts but we got this for our 7 year old son to have his own football to throw around and we all like it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a good ball. Slightly smaller than a regular sized ball but still big for little hands. Good football to toss around.
customer_reviews.author: dru1313

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandson who is obsessed with sports balls. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McRaney

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quakity for Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive but fun and decent uality football. No ought it to use on a bus trip with college students and it got a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: sjbalza

customer_reviews.title: The color delivered was wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the color I ordered. I checked that I did in fact order the red football. I received a blue one. My grandsons favorite color is red. He like all the other children are nervous about the Coronavirus. My goal is to help get his mind off of it anyway I can. This was to go in his Easter basket. The football itself is great. I know this seems petty but I know the reason is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Terry M.

customer_reviews.title: Little heavy for my 8yr old
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to replace our nerf football. After reading some reviews of happy purchases for younger kids, not sure if there are two different models, but the ball we got is a bit heavy and hard to catch for my 8yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Holds up
customer_reviews.text: Holds air well and is very durable. It's a little hard on the ends so kids should be a little older. great for the pool
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great dog toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog, he loves footballs, he is a 90lb lab. The ball has not scratched or popped, he boy loves his new football.
customer_reviews.author: Nattt94

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. My son wanted a blue football and that is what he received!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used for a fall festival at our school. Held up great to al the children throwing them for the football toss all day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs that like to pop balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog, she previously had a Wilson ball which lasted nearly 6 months before she managed to pop it. Thought I would give this a go - it lasted all of 10 seconds before she popped this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Heidi

customer_reviews.title: great football
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 10yr old to hold and grip. It's durable and strudy, especially when kicking the football really hard.
customer_reviews.author: StephSid09

customer_reviews.title: Not what i wanted it but..
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a present for my nephew for my wedding. Too big for his little hands so I returned it. It did seem very durable though,
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to play at the beach & Loved it! Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to play on the beach with the family. The size was perfect. Not too big or small. This was used by adults & even a small child. We had a lot of fun throwing it around. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Great Football for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We like to have a bunch of footballs on hand with three boys who play. This is a great ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorMama

customer_reviews.title: Bigger please
customer_reviews.text: The size of this football is a better fit for a growing toddler. I wish it was slightly larger, but overall good quality and value for what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Legit rubber football
customer_reviews.text: Great grip on this rubber football. Perfect for my 6 year old son to try and lead the concept of throwing and catching a more realistic football. I’m sure this will come along to the lake and pool trips
customer_reviews.author: Vicmob

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 boys and they arrived as planned and the boys love them !! Durable ! Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: High quality football
customer_reviews.text: I bought this football for my nephew for Christmas and he loves it. It’s of great quality and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great family football
customer_reviews.text: This is a great football for kids! My daughter (9) wanted a football to toss around and this is a great size for us!
customer_reviews.author: P. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it. I have had to air it up a few times over the months but that's no problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it! He likes that it is easy to spot in the yard and that he can play football!
customer_reviews.author: Blanckmama

customer_reviews.title: Value product, does not hold air
customer_reviews.text: Not so great quality. i have to inflate it every week despite minimal use. Low quality but value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ankitpatel

customer_reviews.title: Great football at a cheap price point
customer_reviews.text: Nice football for under ten bucks. Son loves the red and black colors. Highly recommend it because it is quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this football. Good price for ball that son takes to school to play with friends
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bird

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and feels great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great football.. durable and visibly attractive. I did think this football would be a little smaller since it's youth. My son is 9 and it's a tad too big for his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Possibly defective
customer_reviews.text: I think I received a defective football. After only two months of use, the football is deflated and will not hold air to keep it inflated. Otherwise it is a great football
customer_reviews.author: djacks015

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and feels durable. I wanted a smaller football to throw around as my hands can't comfortably throw a regular sized football. I didn't realize it was so big still, but that's my fault for not checking the measurements. Still like the feel of it.. nice and grippy.
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Boys love them
customer_reviews.text: My two grandsons really loved them. That’s why I had to buy two. Plus the were much bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.author: bridgette tilghman

customer_reviews.title: Good grip good size
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than college size but bigger than typical nerf ball. Not soft. Not for younger children unless standing close. Waterproof. Great for the beach or tossing around at tailgates.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMaster

customer_reviews.title: Came half deflated
customer_reviews.text: Seems to me like a nice quality however mine was pretty deflated so that was disappointing. I was hoping to open the Box and play with my nephew
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great to play football with my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dog as he loves to play fetch with footballs. Holds up well for him.
customer_reviews.author: tnChick & NarcoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for recess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this football to go with the flag football setup. My students love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ann Whitby

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this, its a little big for his hands but he doesnt care lol
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Addams

customer_reviews.title: Great toy ball for son.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little football. My 6 year old son loves it. For the money, it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mbooth0007

customer_reviews.title: Very thick rubber
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than most balls! I used mine to press out dents in a van.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t just get a steal with purchasing this football but I got a great quality football. The whole family plays with it
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and throws like it should
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old loves it and it works for us adults to throw around at him fires.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: great size and color
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved the color and the smaller size for gripping durable and holds air well
customer_reviews.author: doddie

customer_reviews.title: Kids football.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter and her friends to toss around on camping trips. It's smaller so they can get a better grip on it. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Arrived flat
customer_reviews.text: This ball arrived flat! Good thing the little boy I gifted it to already had a pump or he'd have a very flat football. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Bigger than I expected it to be. It said junior size but its the size of a regular football.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, the little boy is sleeping with it. Loves it, a huge hit for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.author: BAshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good size and grip for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: Good size and grip for the little ones, but didn't last for the summer. Not bad for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Wikiwac

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Buy more than one at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal and can’t beat the price! Great quality and super durable. Bought multiple ones bc my son can’t destroy them!
customer_reviews.author: NGSpring

customer_reviews.title: Great for flag football
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty much like a regular football. Not to small or too big.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cool official ball comes with air so you can just start to play right out the box
customer_reviews.author: Juanito picante

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it, very solid little grippy football
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This football looked exactly like the picture. Great quality!!! My son is five so its a little big for his hand. However it doesn't stop us from playing catch.
customer_reviews.author: JERRI

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal!
customer_reviews.text: Nice!!!! Sweet, just in time for football season! Good value & awesome style. Taught this was one of those small kids balls. Much nicer!
customer_reviews.author: Redwolf

customer_reviews.title: Fun Football
customer_reviews.text: Comes without packaging, so be prepared if planning to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Z from WI

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Perfect for our 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Perfect size for our 6 year old and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Are you ready for some football?
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a mini football but it’s a regular size. Really good quality!
customer_reviews.author: bemusical

customer_reviews.title: Great size for younger kids and pre teens
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for youth! My 11 year old played for hours with his friends at his birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: ALC mom

customer_reviews.title: Nephew says I did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Great size for small hands that are learning the game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It was a good fit for my 6 year old. Haven't put too much time into but good for the price so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great value, assortment of color's.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves the football, the color of the football.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEFLATED AND CANNOT HOLD AIR!
customer_reviews.text: This was deflated upon arrival and won't hold air for more than 2 minutes - a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: EinsteinMed

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I had when I was young. The perfect ball for ages 8-12. Very durable through kicking, throwing, hitting pavement and all around abuse.
customer_reviews.author: jmonroe25

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. My son loves his ball. He’s almost 6.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great football.. a little too hard for the little guys though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Just like the photo! Perfect gift for my 3 year old nephew!
customer_reviews.author: KGipner

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my son and he loves it 💙
customer_reviews.text: love sthe price and a great starter for football. 🤍 💙
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Locklear

customer_reviews.title: Great football and nice price!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 and 10 year old love this football! They have the red one and play with it a lot. Seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Momica101

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Grip-Rite 100 Rubber Junior Football
feature_bullets: Waterproof rubber surface suitable for all condition play
